meanings.definition: A person who gives beauty treatments to the hands and fingernails.
meanings.sent1: The manicurist painted my nails in a pretty pink color.
meanings.sent2: I always feel pampered when I visit the manicurist for a nail treatment.
meanings.sent3: The manicurist joked that my nails were so long, they could be used as weapons!
meanings.sent4: Her skill as a manicurist transformed my rough nails into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The manicurist's gentle touch made my hands feel like royalty.

meanings.definition: A professional who specializes in caring for and decorating the nails of clients.
meanings.sent1: The manicurist at the salon recommended a beautiful design for my nails.
meanings.sent2: Every celebrity has a personal manicurist to keep their nails looking perfect.
meanings.sent3: The manicurist playfully challenged me to a nail-painting competition.
meanings.sent4: She was a magician with nail polish, like a manicurist with superpowers.
meanings.sent5: The manicurist's creativity knew no bounds when it came to nail art.
